sourcesContent:
<template>
  <section id="container-main">
    <side-bar></side-bar>
    <section id="side-right">
      <top-navigator page-title="Home" sub-title="Welcome"></top-navigator>
      <header>{{ pageTitle }}</header>
    </section>
  </section>
</template>

<script>
import SideBar from "@/components/layouts/SideBar.vue";
import TopNavigator from "@/components/UI/TopNavigator.vue";

export default {
  components: {
    SideBar,
    TopNavigator,
  },
  props: ["page-title"],
};
</script>

<style scoped>
#container-main {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: 7% 93%;
  height: 100vh;
  color: #fff;
  background-image: url(../assets/pics/a.jpg);
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-blend-mode: overlay;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.44);
}

#side-right {
  border: 1px solid blue;
}

#side-right > header {
  text-align: center;
}
</style>
